summary: Makes small (pun intended) changes to the Mammoths; which is basically increasing the size.
descriptionHtml:
Okay, so I was on youtube looking through some random stuff and happened to see this video about something if Mammoths were huge or something. Reminded me of the Oliphaunt? /Mumakil? from LOTR; and then I was surprised that no one had already did this mod. (Too simple? lol)

CURRENTLY: (In standard Giant Mammoths)
TAMED Mammoths: Size is increased 100%.
-HP is increased to 1231 (from 931)

WILD Mammoths: Size is increased 150%.
-HP is increased to 1231 (from 931)
-Detection range/ Warn / Attack ranges increased from 1024 / 750 / 300 to 1500/ 1200/ 900.
-Aggression has been changed from Aggressive to Very Aggressive.
-Sound has changed from Normal volume to Very Loud Volume.

OPTIONAL FILES
In BOTH optional files, the TAMED mammoths have the same stats as the WILD Mammoths, meaning greater detection ranges, Very Aggressive (I think I forgot sound though)
In 2k: Mammoths have 2431 HP (Vanilla was 931 and Giant Mammoths was 1231)
50size 2k: Mammoths have 2431 HP, but TAMED is increased by 45% (versus 100%) and WILD is increased 60% (versus 150%)
In 3k: Mammoths have 3431 HP (A whopping 4x that of Vanilla!)

You should only use ONE of the files.

Really, I think that a real modder could do much better with this, considering this is stuff that anyone could do lol. And really all this is here for is those who want something like this without \"setscale\" or who don\'t want to wait for a Martin\'s Monster Mod (or equivalent) to be released.

In a sense, I also wanted to make a boss mammoth or something similar, like giving it a huge stomp that would send the player away, but I\'d rather have a better model than just a retexture for something like that and well, I\'m no modeller lolz. (barely even a modder lol)

FEEL FREE to use this however you choose.
AND DO tell me of any bugs or issues you may encounter with this mod.

I use the heightened races/giant mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7587 which is why the giants are also large.
The armor I wear is http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5853
My sword is http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7370
I cannot give links to Brelyna\'s armor nor hair because it\'s not allowed on the Nexus.
author: Shininku
